misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi, a formidable presence on the golf course, brings a unique blend of power and finesse to every tournament he enters. Hailing from the esteemed St. Laurence Golf club, Jussi is known for his aggressive style of play, typically shaping his shots into a power draw that allows him to attack pins from seemingly impossible angles.

With four past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jussi has consistently demonstrated his commitment to this prestigious event. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication to the sport remains unwavering.

Though Jussi is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his fans remain hopeful that he will make a late entry. His presence is sorely missed, and many believe that his experience and unique shot-making ability could make a significant impact on the tournament.
